description: A former senior executive and former sales manager of Epsilon Data Management LLC (Epsilon) were convicted of selling data of millions of Americans to perpetrators of mail fraud schemes. [...]
title: Data firm execs convicted for helping fraudsters target the elderly

description: The official Microsoft India account on Twitter, with over 211,000 followers, was hijacked by cryptocurrency scammers to impersonate Roaring Kitty, the handle used by notorious meme stock trader Keith Gill. [...]
title: Microsoft India’s X account hijacked in Roaring Kitty crypto scam

description: ​Cox Communications has fixed an authorization bypass vulnerability that enabled remote attackers to abuse exposed backend APIs to reset millions of modems' settings and steal customers' sensitive personal information. [...]
title: Cox fixed an API auth bypass exposing millions of modems to attacks

description: A massive trove of 361 million email addresses from credentials stolen by password-stealing malware, in credential stuffing attacks, and from data breaches was added to the Have I Been Pwned data breach notification service, allowing anyone to check if their accounts have been compromised. [...]
title: 361 million stolen accounts leaked on Telegram added to HIBP

description: ​Security researchers at Tenable discovered what they describe as a high-severity vulnerability in Azure Service Tag that could allow attackers to access customers' private data. [...]
title: Azure Service Tags tagged as security risk, Microsoft disagrees

description: Researchers have published a proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit script demonstrating a chained remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability on Progress Telerik Report Servers. [...]
title: Exploit for critical Progress Telerik auth bypass released, patch now

description: Verizon customers using Android phones report that they receive blurry images through text messages on different services and apps, with no response from Verizon as to why. [...]
title: Verizon users report blurry photos in Android messaging apps
